AboutUs.Title: Why MyMedQuest?
AboutUs.TitleDescription: The best search for dental procedures for any budget
AboutUs.TitleIntro2: MyMedQuest makes it easy and simple from the comfort of your home
AboutUs.Description1: MyMedQuest connects anyone looking for quality dental treatment and easy access to trusted healthcare providers around the world; We are a private global company based in Houston,Texas that operates a true online market service that empowers people, allowing them to search a broad, standardized catalog of medical procedures to find second opinions and treatments, options based on various criteria such as city, region, country, and cost range.
AboutUs.Description2: MyMedQuest provides a normalized/standardized medical procedure catalog with preloaded adjustable pricing where doctors and hospitals can sign up literally hundreds of services in minutes to advertise and show in search results right after their credentials have been validated, which could take a few seconds.

WhatIsMedicalTourism.title: Exploring Medical Tourism: Traveling for Affordable Healthcare
WhatIsMedicalTourism.header: Why do people go abroad to receive medical services?
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P2: Medical tourism is a type of travel where people go to other countries to get medical procedures done. This is usually because they are looking for cheaper treatments and more affordable healthcare.
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P3: Why Do People Choose Medical Tourism?
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P4: The cost of healthcare in the United States is very high, which is why many people look for cheaper treatments elsewhere. Medical tourism is one of the fastest growing industries in the world, and it is expected to keep growing in the future.
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P5: What Are the Benefits of Medical Tourism?
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P6: Medical tourism is a way for people to get medical care in other countries at a lower cost. It also provides an opportunity to experience different cultures and lifestyles.
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P7: What Are the Best Medical Tourism Countries?
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P8: The best medical tourism countries are those that have high-quality healthcare, affordable prices, and good facilities. People are attracted to destinations that offer high quality care at a fraction of the cost of similar treatments in their home countries.
WhatIsMedicalTourism.P9: In conclusion, medical tourism is a growing industry that has been on the rise for the past decade. It is a way for people to get medical care in other countries at a lower cost while providing an opportunity to experience different cultures and lifestyles.

HowItWork.Title: How It Works
HowItWork.TitleDescription: How we facilitate your dental procedure search
HowItWork.UserStep1: Create a free patient account in seconds. Register here.
HowItWork.UserStep2: Search for your procedure in the search bar above.
HowItWork.UserStep3: Browse through our selection of hand-picked dental clinics here.
HowItWork.UserStep4: Find the dentist that best suits you and schedule a consultation.
HowItWork.VisitorsStep1: You want a second opinion, transparent and sound options for one or more medical procedures.
HowItWork.VisitorsStep2: You create a free patient account in seconds at MyMedQuest.com
HowItWork.VisitorsStep3: Set your filters for Country (optional region, city, postal code) run a search for a medical procedure.
HowItWork.VisitorsStep4: The search will return a list of the requested medical procedure as offered by service providers displayed according to the filters you configured. Each procedure will show list price, what is included, description, service provider, location and star rating
HowItWork.VisitorsStep5: After you select one option you like, it will give you the opportunity to add it to your case folder which you will use to schedule a medical case remote consultation appointment with the provider. The selected provider will be able to add more procedures to your case folder during or after your appointment.
HowItWork.VisitorsStep6: You need to fill out a few personal and medical details prior to the request for appointment, you will be able to email or share cloud links with your doctor with documents and images relevant to your case, more might be requested during and after your appointment. During the request for appointment you will pay the fee set by the provider with credit card or PayPal. Fees vary from $40 to $80, $40 being the most common.
HowItWork.ProviderStep1: Create a free provider account either as a hospital or clinic. Register here.
HowItWork.ProviderStep2: Easily register all the services your clinic offers in seconds! Learn How.
HowItWork.ProviderStep3: Thats it, you will now appear in search results for patients to connect with you
HowItWork.BusinessStep1: You create a free provider account either as a group (hospital or clinic) or as a medical practitioner (doctor, dentist). You provide name, address, phone numbers, contact email, facility permit to practice medicine and business permits.
HowItWork.BusinessStep2: You can sign up in a few minutes all the medical procedures you wish to show in search results. You simply select a medical specialty; all medical procedures in our catalog for that specialty will be shown, along with a reference price or a regional average. You simply select the ones you wish to sign up for, adjust your own list price either with an across the board factor or individually, then click the add procedure button and you are done with that specialty.
HowItWork.BusinessStep3: For each staff member you provide professional or manufacturer accreditation information which will be validated with the corresponding agencies or entities for the region or country. All provided agency and manufacturer accreditations will be displayed in the search results for each staff member or facility. You can also upload relevant documents which will also be verified by our staff before going live.
